Title: Rab Ne Bana Di Jodi
Writer: Aditya Chopra (dialogue), Aditya Chopra (screenplay), Aditya Chopra (story)
Actors: Shah Rukh Khan, Anushka Sharma, Vinay Pathak, M.K. Raina
Plot: A breathtaking, goose flesh igniting, awe inspiring love journey of an ordinary man Suri and his 'total opposite' love Taani.
